title: Arts & Culture
meta_description: The rich culture of Hawai’i is as beautiful as its flora and fauna. Visit ‘lolani Palace, learn simple Hawaiian phrases, how to hula or make your own lei in our Hawai’i Culture section on the Aston Waikiki Beach blog.
description: he culture of Miami is as colorful as its Art Deco architecture. The multicultural hub is home to both buzzworthy local artist pop-up shops and world-renowned museums alike. Explore the artistry and cultural identity of Miami with these insider travel recommendations.
